stimulusHtml:
The figure is labeled Graph of f. The x axis ranges from negative one half pi to one half pi in increments of one half pi. The y axis ranges from 0 to 7 in increments of 1. Moving from bottom to top:
• The curve begins at the point (1 comma 0).
• The curve increases from right to left, passing through (0 comma one half pi) and (negative 1 comma pi).
• The curve then increases from left to right, passing through (0 comma three halves pi) and ending at (1 comma two pi).

 

The graph of the parametric function ft=cost,t for 0≤t≤2π is given. Which of the following is the portion of the graph of f on the interval π≤t≤3π2 ?
choicesHtml:
The x axis ranges from negative one half pi to one half pi in increments of one half pi. The y axis ranges from 0 to 7 in increments of 1. Moving from bottom to top:

  • The curve begins at (0 comma one half pi).
  • The curve increases from right to left, ending at (negative 1 comma pi).

 

The x axis ranges from negative one half pi to one half pi in increments of one half pi. The y axis ranges from 0 to 7 in increments of 1. Moving from bottom to top:

  • The curve begins at (1 comma 0).
  • The curve increases from right to left, ending at (0 comma one half pi).

 

The x axis ranges from negative one half pi to one half pi in increments of one half pi. The y axis ranges from 0 to 7 in increments of 1. Moving from bottom to top:

  • The curve begins at (negative 1 comma pi).
  • The curve increases from left to right, ending at (0 comma three halves pi).

 

The x axis ranges from negative one half pi to one half pi in increments of one half pi. The y axis ranges from 0 to 7 in increments of 1. Moving from bottom to top:

  • The curve begins at (0 comma three halves pi).
  • The curve increases from left to right, ending at (1 comma two pi).
